prompts: Create a unique Ground-type Pokemon that thrives in urban environments and has a rocky appearance.
I want a trio of adorable mole-like creatures with big eyes and playful personalities.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a burrowing mammal, complete with charming facial features.
Make a whimsical Ground-type Pokemon with a focus on teamwork and digging abilities.
Imagine a Pokemon trio that can tunnel underground and communicate through vibrations.
Design a Pokemon that showcases a blend of cuteness and earthiness, perfect for a nature setting.
Show me a small, round-bodied Pokemon with a strong connection to the ground and earth elements.
